About Us

About


  • Hive Therapists:

    Hive Therapist is an innovative platform that simplifies the process of finding healthcare services in Myanmar. Users can effortlessly locate nearby or recommended hospitals by selecting options based on services, opening hours, doctors, contact numbers.

  • ++Services

    Additionally, a mental health feature includes a depression test with results linking directly to a list of therapists, ensuring users can quickly access suitable mental health professionals.

  • Quality

    Therapist's user-friendly design and robust features ensure that accessing healthcare services is straightforward and efficient.
